# Who is Shubham Dubey?

Academically, I(Shubham) am a student, pursuing my under-grad degree in Computer Science from [Thakur College of Science and Commerce](https://www.tcsc.edu.in).But apart from academics,I love combining leadership and business strategies to crack growth-oriented oppurtunities with professionals like you :-). 


My career has been a gumbo mix of technology and business hybrid. I spend my time across different areas of interest to explore all possible ideas and opportunities.I am a Investor, a tech-Enthusiast, a keen reader, a passionate photographer, and alot more. Specific topics like Neurology,venture-startup, financial literacy draw my attention immensely. Even organizations like [Google](https://about.google/), [Facebook](https://about.fb.com/), [Amazon](https://www.aboutamazon.com/), etc fill my cup of intrest for their innovative flavours in technology. 

# Currently

At present, I am focused on polishing my investment strategies to dive even deeper in financial markets.Some hours are dedicated to nurture my tech skills, resulting in a simultaneous trending tech-career. 


On occasions, I also take on some freelance oppurtunities for some bucks. And post all these,you may spot me with some great publications, piano(android version :{) or with my friends.

# I like

- Reading
- Research work on Web
- Extending my skills	
- Winter Season
- Startup Strategies and Implementations.
- Books like [Rich Dad Poor Dad](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rich_Dad_Poor_Dad), [Zero to One](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zero_to_One), [Wings of Fire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wings_of_Fire), [The Power of your Subconcious Mind](https://www.en.wikipedia.org/wiki/https://www.musicentrepreneurhq.com/6-things-i-learned-from-the-power-of-your-subconscious-mind-by-joseph-murphy/), etc..
- Expensive Watches(Only those few that are with me :[ )
- [Good design](/)
- [Photography](https://instagram.com/_shubhxx_).

# Fun facts

- Mostly I end up reacting sarcastically on serious situations.
- Sometimes, I forget to unplug earphones for hours even when there's no audio playing :|.
- I just hate tomatoes.
- I am a high tea addict.
- I added this section because I don't want feedbacks that my site is just a resume.

# I dream of

- always finding inspiration.
- enabling a brighter future.
- doing better.
- achieving financial freedom
- some private dreams too :{
